title: Surely I'm not the only one.....
body: So for ages now, whenever I start up my computer, and open LoL, I get to the first window with the Launch button, hit Launch button, and the log in screen never appears, eventually it will appear after about 20 attempts, and then it continues to work fine (Launching, and relaunching etc,) until I shut the computer down, then it starts all over again when I restart. This has been going on for the last couple of patches. I have tried running repair, reinstalling, pretty much everything I can think of, and it still keeps happening. Has anyone else had this problem, if so, how did you fix it, because it's frustrating as hell.

replies.body: Wow, interesting! I wouldn't have thought there would be a lock on the launch button functionality until the pictures have been downloaded. I guess I'm just lucky that the pictures seem to load instantly for me and haven't run into this issue.
You need to wait a bit until all the pictures on the launcher appear, only then the "Launch" button work as intended.
Thanks, I knew it would be something simple haha
